effect.ruby_sapphire: Switches the target out for another of its trainer’s Pokémon selected at random. Wild battles end immediately. Doesn’t affect Pokémon with suction cups or under the effect of ingrain.
effect.emerald: Switches the target out for another of its trainer’s Pokémon selected at random. Wild battles end immediately. Doesn’t affect Pokémon with suction cups or under the effect of ingrain.
effect.firered_leafgreen: Switches the target out for another of its trainer’s Pokémon selected at random. Wild battles end immediately. Doesn’t affect Pokémon with suction cups or under the effect of ingrain.
effect.colosseum: Switches the target out for another of its trainer’s Pokémon selected at random. Wild battles end immediately. Doesn’t affect Pokémon with suction cups or under the effect of ingrain.
effect.xd: Switches the target out for another of its trainer’s Pokémon selected at random. Wild battles end immediately. Doesn’t affect Pokémon with suction cups or under the effect of ingrain.

short_effect.ruby_sapphire: Immediately ends wild battles. Forces trainers to switch Pokémon.
short_effect.emerald: Immediately ends wild battles. Forces trainers to switch Pokémon.
short_effect.firered_leafgreen: Immediately ends wild battles. Forces trainers to switch Pokémon.
short_effect.colosseum: Immediately ends wild battles. Forces trainers to switch Pokémon.
short_effect.xd: Immediately ends wild battles. Forces trainers to switch Pokémon.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Makes the foe flee to end the battle.
flavor_text.emerald: Makes the foe flee to end the battle.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: The foe is made to switch out with an ally. In the wild, the battle ends.
